_header: Yearsday the holy feast high day is and good
_description: Feast of the Circumcision in the South English Legendary

Bod779.First Lines:
Ȝeris & day þe holy feste hy dey is &
                    godefor þylke day oure swete lord schadde fyrst his
                    blode…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…now Ihesu I syrcumsysed was on erþe for al man
                    kynnegraunt vs heuene blysse & schel vs alle fram synne

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
ȜEres day þe holy feste heiȝ day is and goodffor
                    þat ilke day vr swete lord schedde furst is blood…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Vr lord for þis foure þynges let him
                    CircumciseÞe day is good to holde heiȝe of men þat beþ
                    wyse
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

BodTan17.First Lines:
The ȝeris dai þe holi feste heigh dai it is &
                    goodffor þat dai oure suete lord schedte first his
                    blod…
BodTan17.Last Lines:
…Oure lord for þese foure þingis let him
                    circumciseÞat day is wel to holden hiȝe of men þat ben
                    wise

BodRawPoe225.First Lines:
On þe newe ȝeer day þat blessed day an heyȝk day es
                    & goodffor on þat day our lord ihesu schadde first his
                    blood…
BodRawPoe225.Last Lines:
…Hu our lord for þise four thynges he lette hym
                    cirumciseþat day is to ben holden heye Of alle men þat ben
                    wyse

CULAdd3039.First Lines:
Newȝere day þe holy feste helie day it is & gudefor
                    þat day our lorde criste sched firste his suete blode…
CULAdd3039.Last Lines:
…Our lord for þeȝ foure skilleȝ gart hym
                    circumsiseIlk man ogh to worshipe þis day if he be gude &
                    wyse
CULAdd3039.Note:
Listed as f. 111 in Brown  and  Robbins (1943)
XCarleton Fairchild Brown,   and  Rossell Hope Robbins.  
             The Index of Middle English Verse.
         New York: Printed for the Index Society by Columbia University Press,
            1943

CamCCC145.First Lines:
Ȝeresday þe holy feste hey day is and godffor þulke
                    day oure swete louerd ssadde verst is blod…
CamCCC145.Last Lines:
…Oure louerd for þis vour þynges let him
                    circumsiseÞe day is wel to holde heiȝe of men þat beoþ
                    wise

CamTCC605.First Lines:
Ȝeresday þe holy fest hey day is an goudfor þulke
                    day oure swete lord schadde furste his blod…
CamTCC605.Last Lines:
…Oure lord for þis foure þynges lete hym
                    circumciseþe day is wel to hold hey of men þat beth
                    wyse

Digital Facsimile of Trinity College Cambridge MS R.3.25.

BLAdd10301.First Lines:
ȜEres dat þe holy feste hey day ys and godefor þulke
                    day oure swete lorde sscadde ferste ys blode…
BLAdd10301.Last Lines:
…Oure lord for þis foure þynges let him
                    circumsyseþe day ys wel to holde hye of men þat beþ
                    wyse

BLCottJulDIX.First Lines: ȜEres dai þe holi feste hei dai is & goodfore þulke dai our swete lord schedde verst his blod…
BLCottJulDIX.Last Lines: …Our lord so þis foure þynges let him circumsiseþe dai is wel to holde hei of men þat bet wyse
BLCottJulDIX.Note: “Capitulum i” added to right margin by later hand (f. 2).
BLCottJulDIX.Facsimiles:
Digital Facsimile of British Library  Cotton Julius MS D IX.
         https://www.bl.uk/manuscripts/FullDisplay.aspx?ref=Cotton_MS_Julius_D_IX.

BLEge1993.First Lines: Ȝeres day þe holi feste heiȝ day is and godvor þilke dai oure swete lord schedde vurst is blod…
BLEge1993.Last Lines: …Oure lord vor þese foure þinges let him circumsiseþe day is to holden heiȝe of men þat beþ wise

BLEge2810.First Lines: ȜEris day þe holi feste heye day ys and godffor þulke day houre swete louyrd sschadde furst ys blod…
BLEge2810.Last Lines: …Oure louird uor þis uoure þingis let him circumsiseÞe day is wel to holdin heye of men þat buþ wise

Lam223.First Lines:
A Holy ffeste is ȝeres day hegh fest hit is & godeffor on
                    þat ilke day oure lord shed firste his blode…
Lam223.Last Lines:
…Oure lord for þese þinges four lete hym
                    circumciseAnd þerfore honoures alle þat day if ȝe ben wise .
                    Amen

TokyoTak54.First Lines:
Neweȝeres day a greet feste is an high day and a goodFor that
                    day oure swete lorde shadde first his blood…
TokyoTak54.Last Lines:
…Oure lorde for thise foure thinges bad hym hym circumciseThat
                    it falleth to holden high of men that ben wise
